mdRecord.dcterms:title: Declaration of Independence. : In Congress, July 4, 1776: the unanimous declaration of the thirteen United States of America
United States. Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letterpress, with the text of the Declaration printed in two columns within an ornamental arch surmounted by an eagle, with a wood engraving of the Capitol below. The arch is surrounded by tables listing governors of the states, reigning sovereigns of Europe, and snippets of statistical and historical information about the United States and the individual states. The whole is within an elaborate border of type ornaments. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: KF4506 .A1 1832: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003. (Triple-matted) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Statistics--United States--States
United States--Statistics
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New York, New York (State), United States
